row.entry: The velvia module enhances the saturation in the image; it increases saturation on lower saturated pixels more than on high saturated pixels.

sect5.title: Saturation
sect5.para: This slider controls the strength of saturation for the effect.

sect5.title: Vibrance
sect5.para: Vibrance controls how much of the saturation is applied to weighted pixels.

sect5.title: Mid-tones bias
sect5.para: This slider controls saturation preservation in mid-tones. It is expressed as the lightness repartition between mid-tones and shadows/highlights. The greater the first number, the stronger the effect.
